TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IDReferencePropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class IDReferencePropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class IDReferencePropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义应用于包含 ID 引用的属性的属性。

span.span: Defines an attribute applied to properties that contain ID references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类应用于包含 ID 的引用的属性。The class is applied to properties that contain ID references. 是一个包含 ID 引用属性的示例。 is an example of a property that contains an ID reference. 应用此属性时，设计器可以在设计期间，如列出 Id 提供附加功能。When this attribute is applied, designers can provide additional functionality during design time, such as listing IDs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何特性应用于一个属性，计算结果为字符串。The following code example demonstrates how the attribute is applied to a property that evaluates to a string. 在此示例中，`DataSourceID`成员标识一个数据源控件，并因此指定类型。In this example, the `DataSourceID` member identifies a data source control and therefore specifies the type.
